channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Taiwan-Made 'Haikun' Sub To Be Deployed in 2025

item.title: Health Ministry Launches Platform To Help Taiwan's Social Workers
item.description: The health ministry says a new high-tech computer platform will help ease the burdens social workers face in their jobs.

item.title: KMT Lawmakers Heading to China Spark Debate in Taiwan Legislature
item.description: A planned visit to China by a delegation of 20 opposition Kuomintang lawmakers has Taiwan's legislature divided.

item.title: A Tibetan in Exile Fights for His Right To Live With Family in Taiwan
item.description: A Tibetan in exile and his Taiwanese wife go through a nearly decade-long struggle to secure a happy life together in Taiwan.
